extendedInfo.description: Have a Pillow fort that just needs a door bell? or how about your friends zone out and you need to get their attention? Maybe you just want to mess with your class mates!this Doorbell app is for you! its a simple button that plays a "ding dong" sound when you press it!there are many uses for it and just to name a few!- Mess with you mom while shes cooking- Distract someone to the door- Stick it out side of a bathroom stall- Entertain your sister- Escape from prison- Find Waldo- Potty train your dog- Create a Pillow house- Customise your room- Make a baby quit crying- Prank your friends** Download Doorbell server for PC and mac at http://goo.gl/8lEnzHow To:1. Make sure you have port forwarded to port 2010 before starting your server, if you need help you can go to portforward.com2. Start the server3, Open the app and type in your public IP address, if you dont know it you can go to http://www.whatsmyip.org on your computer4. Click Connect and press the big red button, you should hear the doorbell come from your computer!***with a little hacking you can make it play different sounds too ;) but you can figure that one outsorry for the terrible ui :/
